data.name: Red Nivis
data.detailed_description:
Red Nivis is a roguelike metroidvania where you explore the ruins of the Red Nivis Laboratory.







There are 6 main areas to explore: Lab, Maintenance Rooms, Deep Labs, Freezers, Chem Sector, Tech Sector. All of these being unique and focused on a different way to change the gameplay. The Freezer's aquatic based enemies make you play differently than the poison based Chem Sector enemies.




There are tons of weapons for you to choose from. Weapons build off previous weapons and make them better and better while also making each iteration of the idea different from the last.



But weapons aren't all there is to find! You have passives as well, all of which change the game in a noticeable way! A mini drone, a completely useless box, jetpack, you name it.


You have a bunch of unique NPCs which can change the way you play or make the world a better place to play in!




You'll have a fun world to play in that captures the feeling that metroidvanias give, while also being your own world. You have a ton of NPCs, weapons, and bosses to find in this weird shape shifting laboratory!

If you're still reading, give Red Nivis a wishlist! :)

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928130/Red_Nivis/

data.short_description: A rogue-like metroidvania where you explore the ruins of the Red Nivis Laboratory. No run will be the same, but will also give you the metroidvania feeling of finding a shortcut, or remembering that there's a cool area you can now explore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Supports OpenGL 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu (64 bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Supports OpenGL 3
  • Additional Notes: Tested on EndeavourOS, Ubuntu, and ArchLinux.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
